title: Android 12L: The best way to tap At a Glance to open Google Calendar
content:
With the Pixel 6 and Android 12, Google redesigned At a Glance to be left-aligned and made it just open the Weather app by default. Android 12L makes it so that tapping At a Glance’s top line opens Google Calendar again.

more…

The post Android 12L: The best way to tap At a Glance to open Google Calendar appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Android 12L makes it so that tapping the top line of At a Glance opens Google Calendar. Here's a trick on how to increase the likelihood...
